es.host.label: Elasticsearch Host
es.host.description: Specify the hostname and port for your elasticsearch instance, for example localhost:9200.

es.transportAddresses.label: Transport Addresses
es.transportAddresses.description: The addresses for nodes. Specify the address for at least one node, and separate others by commas. Other nodes will be sniffed out. For example: host1:9300,host2:9300.

es.cluster.label: Cluster Name
es.cluster.description: The name of the cluster to connect to. Defaults to elasticsearch

es.index.label: Index
es.index.description: The index name where the documents will be stored. If the index does not exist, one will be created using elasticsearch defaults.

es.type.label: Type
es.type.description: The type the documents will be stored as. If the type does not exist, one will be created.

es.idField.label: ID Field
es.idField.description: The idField will specify from which field the id of the document is derived.

query.label: Query
query.description: The query used to select record from the specified index/type; for example, ?q=* will select all records.

schema.description: The schema or mapping of the data in elasticsearch.
